name: Raccoon Rummage
description:
Play as a ravenous raccoon, the bane of modern civilization, in this survival horror game. Scavenge for food in a middle-class neighborhood, forge an angry feud with a resident, and survive against all odds.

Controls

  • Press 'W' to peek. 
  • Press 'S' to look within the garbage bin. 
  • Click and drag 'Left Mouse' to rummage through the trash.
  • Press 'Shift' to hide.
  • Don't make too much noise!

This game was made for the 2022 Fall SGDA Game Jam in 40 hours.

Creators:

  • Brandon Coffey: Programming
  • Ian Percy: Programming and Implementation
  • Christa : 2D Art
  • Michael Cabrera: SFX and Design 
  • Angel : 2D Environment Art
  • Jack Vanzine: Design

Used a plethora of free-use sounds and fonts.
